nodes.speaker: Aisha
nodes.text: My parents argue a lot about money. I can’t focus on homework when that’s happening.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Do you want me to listen now, help you make a short plan for homework, or find an adult who can help?

choices.text: Listen — sometimes I just need someone to hear me.
Let's make a small homework plan you can follow in quiet moments.
We can find a counselor or teacher to talk to.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You sit with Aisha as she speaks. The simple act of being heard lightens some of the burden.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You help Aisha break homework into 20-minute chunks she can do between family tensions.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You suggest a trusted teacher. Aisha agrees to try speaking to them this week.

nodes.speaker: Aisha
nodes.text: Thank you. I feel less alone and I can try the plan tomorrow.
